article_title: Gazans in survival mode with cold nights and food rations
sentence: The  Israel-Gaza  war  erupted  on  7  October  when  Hamas  gunmen  infiltrated  southern  Israel,  killing  about  1,200  people  and  taking  253  others  hostage.

sentence: At  least  29,800  Palestinians  have  been  killed,  according  to  Gaza's  Hamas-run  health  ministry.
